titlestmt.titleproper: Tammany Pea Shore Fishing Company account books 1859-1917
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: Tammany Pea Shore Fishing Company account books
did.repository: University of Delaware Special Collections Department Morris Library, 181 South College Avenue Newark, DE 19717-5267

bioghist.p: The Tammany Pea Shore Fishing Company was a Philadelphia social club.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of the Tammany Pea Shore Fishing Company. The volumes include a stock share book, 1854-1917, with original stock certificates and documentation related to transfers of shares; a checkbook, 1876-1910, with stubs for checks issued for cleaning, repairs, and coal deliveries; a ledger of members' accounts, 1871-1886; and a ledger of the Secretary's membership accounts, 1875-1914. Both of the membership volumes list payments of fees, house rental, and other expenses incurred by members.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of the Moyerman family.
